html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-12272017-10-05,  ,  ,  ECCC,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Designating Regulatory Provisions for Purposes of Enforcement (Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999)
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS DESIGNATING REGULATORY PROVISIONS FOR PURPOSES OF ENFORCEMENT (CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999) in order to designate various provisions of regulations made and that are linked to a fine regime following the successful prosecution of an offence involving harm or risk of harm to the environment, or obstruction of authority. The Regulations will reflect the addition of new offences pertaining to the import, manufacture and export of Hydrofluorocarbons.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0217 Publication Date: 2017-10-18
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Regulations Designating Regulatory Provisions for Purposes of Enforcement (Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999)
precis: Regulations Amending the REGULATIONS DESIGNATING REGULATORY PROVISIONS FOR PURPOSES OF ENFORCEMENT (CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999) in order to designate various provisions of regulations made and that are linked to a fine regime following the successful prosecution of an offence involving harm or risk of harm to the environment, or obstruction of authority.  The Regulations will reflect the addition of new offences pertaining to the import, manufacture and export of Hydrofluorocarbons.
